1.0.name: wordpress/schmie-lstfm2
1.0.description:
The Widget show's the your recent track's and if you're listening to music at the moment. If there's a player with last.fm support playing music or if you are listening on last.fm an image named gruen.jpg in the folder img will be showed(If not, the shown image is rot.jpg).

Note: this is my first serious wordpress plugin. Please leave me comments, propositions or hints on my blog. Have fun!
